page.title: 18CAMPANOLOGY IN CALVERLEY
page.content: The tower at Calverley Church contains a ringing peal of 8 bells, cast and maintained by Mears and Stainbeck now the Whitechapel Bell Foundry in London.The Tower Captain and Ringing Master is Mr P.M. Dawson. He arranges the ringing,keeps the bells and ropes in working order and adjusts the clock as necessary. The ringers,except for Mr. and Mrs. Dawson who are "Surprise" ringers and spend much of their spare time ringing in various parts of the country, are "Plain Method" ringers. Mr. and Mrs. Dawson were proud and honoured to be invited to ring in the quarter peal,rung half muffled on Sunday 19th.May 1985 at Bradford Cathedral in memory of the Bradford City Fire victims.
